2023

My name is Michael Bowman, and I am currently a postdoctoral researcher at University of Pennslyvania in the Cancer Biology department. I received B.S. degrees in both Mechanical Engineering and Electrical Engineering from Colorado School of Mines in 2017. Following, I received a PhD within the Department of Mechanical Engineering, Colorado School of Mines in 2023.
